mapper.sql: a.proid AS "proid", a.code AS "code", a.proname AS "proname", a.prosort AS "prosort", a.proremark AS "proremark", a.latitude AS "latitude", a.longitude AS "longitude"
mapper.select: SELECT a.code AS "code", a.proname AS "name", a.proid AS "id", IF(count(b.cityid)>0,true,false) AS "parent", "1" AS "type" FROM ots.t_province a LEFT JOIN ots.t_city b ON b.proid=a.proid group by a.ProID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ots.t_province( proid, code, proname, prosort, proremark, latitude, longitude ) VALUES ( #{proid}, #{code}, #{proname}, #{prosort}, #{proremark}, #{latitude}, #{longitude} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ots.t_province SET proid = #{proid}, code = #{code}, proname = #{proname}, prosort = #{prosort}, proremark = #{proremark}, latitude = #{latitude}, longitude = #{longitude} WHERE id = #{id}
